mapper.select: SELECT fbno bno, id, title, wdate, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fileinfo WHERE fbno = f.fbno AND isshow = 'Y' ) cnt FROM fileboard f, member m WHERE writer = mno AND f.isshow = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fileboard(fbno, title, body, writer) VALUES( fbrdseq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{body}, ( SELECT mno FROM member WHERE id = #{id} ) )
